analyzed: ▁yas o dhar āpa mukh a das a bhikkh u nī sahass a apad āna

original: Itthaṁ sudaṁ yasodharāpamukhāni dasabhikkhunīsahassāni bhagavato sammukhā imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
analyzed: ▁itth aṃ ▁sud aṃ ▁yas o dhar āpa mukh āni ▁dasa bhikkh u nī sahassāni ▁bhagavato ▁sammukhā ▁imā ▁gāthā yo ▁abhāsitthāti
